title: TIAA Offers Annuity Product for Corporate 401(k) Retirement Plans
sub_head: Money managers including BlackRock and AllianceBernstein are moving to meet demand for guaranteed lifetime income
body:
American workers who crave steady retirement paychecks in the absence of old-fashioned pension plans are getting more alternatives as another money manager launches an annuity offering for corporate 401(k) retirement-savings programs.
The newest entrant is Teachers Insurance and Annuity Association of America, one of the nationâ€™s oldest names in the retirement industry. Well-known for lifetime payouts to retirees of U.S. colleges, healthcare systems and nonprofits, TIAA is offering a guaranteed lifetime-income product in the corporate 401(k) market.
